title: (x) Easy Font id for y'all - Verdana {Stephen L}
content:
Okay, this matching this one is driving me crazy, but it's got to be some basic font that I'm missing, or possibly a hinted version of something I am checking.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [audrey-h.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014060552/http:/typophile.com/files/audrey-h_0.png) | 16.11 KB |
| [scott-h.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014060552/http:/typophile.com/files/scott-h_0.png) | 14.06 KB |
| [maegen-h.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014060552/http:/typophile.com/files/maegen-h_0.png) | 15.11 KB |
author: samadam

comments.content: Yeah, that was my thought. Must be some Windows pixel hinting that I can't match, because the g and a are stretched vertically relative to what I have.
Probably so. I notice even just in Photoshop that cycling through the antialiasing options can pretty dramatically change the letter shapes and spacing at these sizes.
